SELECT s.s_id, s.s_name, s.s_email, s.s_creation_date, s.s_lastUpdate_date, st.st_id, st.st_name FROM gst_subcontractor s INNER JOIN gst_status st ON s.s_fk_status_id = st.st_id WHERE s.s_id = #{sId}
